ygData.subject: Re: Level 7
ygData.msgSnippet: Well for me levels 5 6 7 8 were the hardest to get.  At level 8 with new spells i grabed new summon spell and ward undead and soloed a dwarf skeleton spawn
ygData.messageBody:
Well for me levels 5 6 7 8 were the hardest to get. At level 8 with new
spells i grabed new summon spell and ward undead and soloed a dwarf skeleton
spawn that spawned 4 skels and got level 9 in hours. Then i soloed
chessboard to level 12, level once a day. Then I killed orcs from 12 to 16
solo and got 1 level per day. 6-7 hours.

>Just looking for a little encouragement, was Level 7 the most difficult
>for everyone? I'm struggling to get to 8, my pet doesn't seem to help
>much and my Mana regeneration is very slow, even with meditate. I know
>things get better at 8 but will every level like this (11,15,19 etc.)
>be this difficult? Or is just me? My ranger character advanced easily
>until he hit the teens so this has been frustrating. Is grouping the
>only solution to problems like these? Not my first choice....
>
>Thanks,
>Saga-Mith.Marr
